rule.description: ATT&CK T1134: Meterpreter or Cobalt Strike Getsystem Service Start
rule.info: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service starting
Falsepositives: Commandlines containing components like cmd accidentally. Jobs and services started with cmd.
